lines.text: [MUSIC]
Last time on Gun City!
Our heroes were attacked on the train by a seemingly endless parade of Ken Bone guards from Gadsfield.
This insurmountable fight grew increasingly surmountable once Leroy Peanutbutter and his gang of roving Ken Bone hobos took the opportunity,
provided by Sullivan's flubbing to stage a train revolution.
Thinking quickly, Blowtoss Pisc teleported the gang above the train,
where they were greeted by a very angry King Gad,
whose mech was poised to obliterate the group.
Knowing all he loves is improv and musical theatre,
the crew sang and danced to the best of their ability in a desperate plea for their life.
Rolling a natural 20, Sullivan the Frog was like a regular Ricky Martin,
and King Gadd spared them if he could quote-unquote have Sullivan. This, as a
successful rebellion from Leroy's train hobos, meant the group could successfully
arrive in Who-town, not to be confused with Whoville.
